casebody.data:
In re Condemnation of Easement and Right of Way Across Lands of Curtis R. Lauchle, Terri L. Lauchle, by UGI Penn Natural Gas, Inc., for Public Purposes; Petition of Curtis R. Lauchle, Terri L. Lauchle NO. 93 MAL 2016 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania June 27, 2016 Appeal from the Commonwealth Court.

Disposition: Denied.
